## Source: kam193 (fecfc822a8976103368c32882bbc7c420938c161e019165d9acd67cb08e2f45a)
Package contains obfuscated reverse shell. However, it connects with a local IP only, thus it's much more a test than a malicious action

Category: PROBABLY_PENTEST - Packages looking like typical pentest packages, but also anything that looks like testing, exploring pre-prepared kits, research & co, with clearly low-harm possibilities.
Campaign: 2025-10-donotinstall
